website_summaries.verdict: Low-priced reusable bag for running errands or grocery shopping.
pros: The BAGGU brand bag is extremely sturdy and perfect for carrying whatever items you've purchased, up to 50lbs worth of stuff
The bag is available in many colors and is made of eco-friendly materials
The easy-to-clean nylon material is also tear proof
cons: Bag doesn't come with a stuff sack for storage

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not practical
customer_reviews.text: I gave this an extras star because the elephants are really cute. I've got to main qualms with the design: 1. the pouch that the bag is stored in is separate from the bag itself (rather than attached to the bag itself); meaning if the little pouch is misplaced you're out of luck. 2. the straps are too short to carry over the shoulder--which is a pain if you're carrying your groceries even a few blocks. Really cute; just not very practical
customer_reviews.author: R. Blank

customer_reviews.title: loud "crinkly" fabric, pattern upside down on one side
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first Baggu bag in an airport, and I love it. I just got the black and white "phases of the moon" bag from Amazon, and it's not quite as good as the one I bought in the airport for 2 reasons: 1) The ripstop nylon fabric is quite loud, and almost crinkly, sort of like a plastic bag. 2) this moon print has some text on it - the fabric on one side of the bag is upside down, so the text is upside down. It's not that big a deal, but $10 is plenty for a simple nylon bag. I'll keep the bag, but it's not as nice as the first one I got.
customer_reviews.author: Xena45

customer_reviews.title: Best reusable bags ever
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price. Living somewhere with a plastic bag ban makes keeping bags in my purse essential. These fold up pretty small (I don't put them back in their little bag, I just roll them up and wrap the handle around) and I can keep 4 in my small purse at all times. I machine wash and hang dry or put in the dryer periodically (if I've used it at the grocery store with raw meat or after I've used it on a trip as my dirty laundry bag), I still have and use baggu bags from 10+ years ago, they are so sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bag, and have now purchased some more for myself and friends. Not only are the designs very cute and trendy, but these take up zero room in your purse/bag so you can always have it with you and don't have to try and remember to grab your reusable bags from home or car every shopping trip. They're very sturdy - have been able to carry at least 2 regular bags worth of groceries in this, including heavy items like a gallon of milk. When you're done - very easy to fold back up and pop into it's little case.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: So handy to keep in your purse for when you need a bag at the grocery store.
customer_reviews.text: I love the baggu. Have bought some for friends who love it also. So handy to have and great in emergencies when you need it, carry in the purse and it's always available. Very durable, can machine wash it. It carries a lot of merchandise and is very strong. You can carry it over your shoulder like a purse or carry in hand. I will always have this as it is one of the must-haves for these days when stores charge money for bags and you didn't bring enough or need just one, you've got it covered.
customer_reviews.author: Froggyleap

customer_reviews.title: Must have reusable bag.
customer_reviews.text: Baggu products are simply the best. These bags fold up to almost no size, wash great and last a super long time, even with weekly/daily use. I bought this bag for my purse after the NYC plastic bag ban, but I’ve got probably a dozen or more baggu shoppers in all three sizes at home. Baby baggu is great for lunch, gym clothes or little stuff. Regular baggu is perfect for groceries and errands. Big baggu is THE BEST laundry bag I’ve ever had. Support a female owned, conscious business by buying baggu’s fantastic products!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Hale

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent shopping bag.
customer_reviews.text: The bag it comes with is very convenient, and it's pretty easy to fold back in. Compact too, fits in my back pocket with ease. It's pretty sturdy, not any rips or tears after a few heafty shopping trips. It doesn't really sling over the shoulder well, and it can be harder to carry bulkier loads of groceries, especially when walking a bit of a distance, but it is otherwise a great bag and more convenient and comfortable than most other bags I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second baggu I've ordered. The color (cranberry) is beautiful and as expected. I like the separate carrying pouch, which I know some people dislike. The first one I've owned for over 5 years and I've never lost or damaged the pouch. These bags fold up so small, both easily fit in my purse and I always have them on me. I never remember to put the larger, traditional-style reusable bags back in my car. I treat my baggu bags differently, maybe because I think they're more aesthetically pleasing, and like taking the time to fold them up and pop them back in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia White

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag put wish there was abelt clip
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this bag, its a pretty print and very roomy and folds up so nicely. The only thing missing is a belt loop clip. I got this for traveling to foreign countries bc we always go to farmers markets or road side stands. I dont carry a purse so its nice to have it clipped to something. Not having a clip means carrying it in your pocket and that's easy to loose.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Wondrasek

customer_reviews.title: So convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy I purchased this, I could never remember to bring my reusable bags but to have one always conveniently in my purse has helped me never forget! I was concerned it would be a pain to fold this larger bag back up into such a small bag, but it’s super fast & easy! The bag holds a good amount of groceries but I need to get a few more. I have a family of 5, so we get a lot of groceries when we shop!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: The perfect combination of fun and practical
customer_reviews.text: My first Baggu shopping bag was a gift and I've bought two more since then. The patterns are great and the bag is roomy, especially considering how small it folds down. I carry my baggu in my back jean pocket along with my phone. Loaded with heavy items, it holds up super well. Highly reccommed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: critic

customer_reviews.title: They easily fold back into the bags
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints. These hold a crapton of canned goods, and frozen foods, or produce, etc. I have been able to do a whole grocery trip in 2.5 bags. if they get wet, they dry quickly. Nothing has ripped through. They easily fold back into the bags. I can see why some would want to have the bag attached to its holding bag for fear of loss. I personally addressed my concern by attaching braided floss to the Baggu tag on the holding bag and sewing it to the hemline of the reusable bag with enough slack that I can finagle it with ease. Problem solved. Definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Welling

customer_reviews.title: I love my Baggu!
customer_reviews.text: The Baggu is fantastic for all kinds of things, but I primarily use it for impromptu grocery trips when I've forgotten my other reusable bags. The bag itself is so durable and can hold a good deal of stuff - it's a great size and it's super sturdy. Plus! it folds flat into a tiny little pouch, which is fantastic for keeping in your backpack/purse/car/whatever. The designs Baggu offers are so cute - I bought another one for my mom and will be buying several more for myself and gifts for others.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Austin

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of three. Kept one and gave the other two to my daughters. They are small and fit in your purse. However when you open them they are huge and hold a whole lot of groceries. Very strong. I always have a bag available and no one knows it’s hiding in my purse. Now I know why these are one of Oprah’s favorites things!!!
customer_reviews.author: Casimon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect reusable bag, well, nearly perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these bags for years, and just needed a couple more now that my city banned bags. Durable, washable, light weight, compact, and even has it own pouch. The only nits are, the large is a bit large and easy to over load....for me to carry, the bag will carry it. Also, the pouch is seperate.....first thing i do is invert the bag and pouch, and sew the bottom edges together. This way i just scuh the bag into the pouch...and i cant loose it. Only real issue is baggers when they remove from pouch...tend to leave it inverted.
customer_reviews.author: Neil E Howell

customer_reviews.title: Will buy more!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! It folds up into its bag super easily and nicely and I use it daily, from groceries to laundry and so many things in between. I bought this to study abroad in England so I didn't have to use plastic bags (which they charge for), and its a small cost to not use so much plastic every day. The bag is sturdy, the pattern is bright and cute, and I will likely buy a few more soon to use in the everyday.
customer_reviews.author: noelle_cecilia

customer_reviews.title: These hold a lot
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with these bags. I say these because I went back and bought more. I've taken them to the grocery store and other stores many times and they hold a lot. They're also very sturdy. I've put milk and other heavier items in them with no problems at all. The cashier at one store asked me where I got them. They look nice and fold to a compact size. They're a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: lilygls

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing...
customer_reviews.text: Looks cheap like a freebie... why did I pay for this even with international shipping fee.. Differnt from the image. Above all, the fabric is differnt from last year’s model( I have Hilo)! Texture is much more stiff even with rustling noise(which is annoying)! Hilo is smooth and a bit polishing. Why did Baggu change the fabric without notice?? I wasted my time waiting for this low quality bag.
customer_reviews.author: avril

customer_reviews.title: Love These Bags!
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these bags. This one - with the Cockatoo design - I have bought to give as a gift. These bags are sturdy as all get out, and lightweight enough to roll up and fit in a pants pocket. They are colorful and the grocery clerks seem to get a laugh out of the fun designs, for what that's worth. Great product well made, and reasonably priced...and while you are here...I highly recommend their backpacks, too.
customer_reviews.author: Carl LaFong

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE BAGS!
customer_reviews.text: At least twice the size of grocery store plastic bags. Durable quality. No loose strings along the inside seams like some of the cheaper quality nylon bags. The designs are attractive, even the solid colors. They fold into compact pouches similar to the size of a pack of travel size tissues which is nice and when you have to take your bag out you can just pop the pouch into the Baggu bag so it's conveniently there after you unpack. For anyone who uses reusable bags, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: GemGem

customer_reviews.title: Not that great. Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Nice material but the handles should be on the other sides of the bag so it works better when it’s full. As it is it’s not very comfortable or efficient to use. Overpriced. I like my cheaper bags better. Tho I keep this one in my handbag for impromptu purchases since it folds up small
customer_reviews.author: Koosh

customer_reviews.title: Durable, folds small, but carries a lot
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Baggu shopping bag. My first one lasted many years and is still good, but starting to fade. They fold up very flat and are easy to carry around, but when open, they hold a ton of stuff securely. They also sit on your shoulder nicely. I've had other similar bags that slip down or dig in uncomfortably. Edit: I see a lot of negative reviews saying the bag doesn't sit comfortably on your shoulder. Not sure why I have a different experience. Maybe it's the weight. I usually have mine pretty full of groceries.
customer_reviews.author: greensneakers

customer_reviews.title: Baggu is a hit
customer_reviews.text: Baggu has finally started giving designs for awhile now.At one time all they had was solid bags.Every time I used bag I get so many compliments the downside to this is I should have purchased more than this one. I used the solid ones for food shopping.Most of the time I used it when I go to the mall or outlets.These are strong & durable,they wash up well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bags!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags. They fold up compact and fit in the pouch they come in. I keep two in my small purse all the time for every little purchase. I have easily avoided a minimum of 100 plastic bags in a few months. They are very durable and easily washable. The size is great for carrying what you would put in probably two standard plastic grocery bags.
customer_reviews.author: tgoehring

customer_reviews.title: New favorite product
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bag. It fits easily in my purse without taking up much space. Design is super cute and the bag is extremely sturdy. Took it to Trader Joes and jammed it full of stuff with no issues. Surprisingly big in size. Folds easily as the creases are still there so I use that for help. Love that it's always with me in my purse so I don't have to remember to grab one from home.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Reusable Shopping Bags - I Already Bought 4🤩
customer_reviews.text: They have just changed the laws in my county and store bags now cost 5 cents each. While everyone was screaming about it on Facebook, I was ordering 2 of these. They are so great I had to order 2 more almost immediately. I have lots of other reusable shopping bags, but now these are by far my favorite ones!! They are easy to refold and put back into their little bag and they easily hold about 3 grocery bags. I love the sailor strips and have actually gotten compliments on them😀
customer_reviews.author: writeonwriteon

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! It's small enough to easily fit into my purse and it refolds into it's carrying pouch nicely. It's a great way to not have to use a plastic bag and I get compliments on it every time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: SuperShopper

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors, light weight, will constructed for using when shopping. They fold nice and neatly and go back into their little pouches easily. Perfect for keeping in car, purse, coat pocket for easy access when shopping. Will purchase from this buyer again.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Need to buy more!
customer_reviews.text: These bags have been a lifesaver! I have so many reusable grocery bags around the house but always forget about them when I'm in the car to the store. I bought a couple of these to put in my purse and I always have them to go to the store! The bags do hold a lot. The straps are like regular plastic bags so it is difficult to slip over your shoulders. It is very easy to fold the bag back into the small pocket for future use.
customer_reviews.author: Van Dinh

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and stylish recycle bag
customer_reviews.text: Baggu bags are convenient to carry and offer a variety of designs to choose from. They're easy to fold up and put away, but the little pouch that it folds into can easily be misplaced. It's my go-to recycle bag for everyday use. I have all three sizes, but have found the largest bag to be too big to use on a weekly trip to the grocery store, the midsized bag is the best.
customer_reviews.author: C Dee

customer_reviews.title: My favorite pattern!! 💕
customer_reviews.text: Its my favorite pattern ever!! I love how the blue outlines for the smiley pair well with the yellow of the bag. Its not as intense as the black and yellow version. I wish this version lasted longer or was permanent though! 😭 I would've also gotten the baby baggu version.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Went straight from the box into its permanent home in my backpack
customer_reviews.text: THIS BAG IS AMAZING. I live in NYC and commute nearly an hour to work every day so I don't really have a schedule for when I go shopping, either for food or for random knick knacks. Since getting this bag, it's basically found a permanent spot in my purse along with my keys and wallet. It's really well-made, super durable, and a lot easier to clean than a normal canvas tote bag. It's really easy to slip right back into its carrying pouch. The size is just slightly bigger than a normal plastic grocery bag.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Xu

customer_reviews.title: thicker & noisier & stiffer
customer_reviews.text: I loved my original Baggu. Soft. Strong. Compact. Keep it in my purse all the time for any shopping. BUT this new Baggu was just like other reviewers said: thicker, crinkly, stiffer. What happened! It's definitely not the same quality at all. For a $10 bag, not worth it. Sorry. Have to return it and look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: mythoughts

customer_reviews.title: My new regular tote
customer_reviews.text: I owned 2 BAGGU bags before and used them as my grocery shopping bags. They were durable & super easy to clean. I purchased this one to be used as my regular tote for a casual day out. The color came as displayed. The fabric felt as durable as their other products. Easy to keep as it could be folded into a small package. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sasikarn Vechprasit

customer_reviews.title: It's got superpowers. I'm sure of it.
customer_reviews.text: Love the bright watermelon print! These bags are awesome - I use them to carry heavy groceries, return library books, or as an extra bag when your suitcase won't close. And you won't believe how sturdy it is: I got my first BAGGU to hang on a scooter when I had to be off my foot for a few months - I tossed my laptop, books, art supplies, crazy heavy stuff in there, and it still looks brand new. No tearing, split seams or color fading. Just buy one - it's totally worth it :)
customer_reviews.author: abbey

customer_reviews.title: 99% perfec but worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: The bag is fantastic as an on the go shopping bag: it’s lightweight, compact, and has a lot of room. The ONLY issue I have is that its a little difficult to sling over a shoulder- it can be done but the strap positioning is awkward. Better for an arm or just carrying by hand. But I always have mine with me!
customer_reviews.author: stasiaghghg

customer_reviews.title: They are made a little different than previous versions
customer_reviews.text: They feel thinner and different than previous versions. I will stick with my original Baggu bags and hope that they go back to the slightly thicker, higher quality version some day.
customer_reviews.author: seattleshopper315

customer_reviews.title: Go Green, Go BAGGU
customer_reviews.text: These suckers can hold about 5 plastic bags worth of groceries and I haven’t broken one yet. I do wish the case was attached because I firmly believe I will lose one. I keep buying more styles because they are adorable and useful and good for the world.
customer_reviews.author: Karin R.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag because I wanted to be more environmentally cautious and stop using plastic bags when I shop for groceries. I wasn't sure what to expect from it when I ordered it, but it succeeded any expectations I could've had. It's spacious, durable, and very easy to fold/store. It holds a lot more than I'd anticipated and it's super cute. I'm definitely going to order more - for me and my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Mella

customer_reviews.title: Different material than the original
customer_reviews.text: These are still the same shape and size as the original but are made of a much stiffer material.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bags easily fold back up into the little pouch it comes ...
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these bags now. They hold more 1.5x more than your standard brown paper grocery bag. The handles are wide enough to carry a full bag over your shoulder. Bags easily fold back up into the little pouch it comes with. Once folded in the pouch, it's about 4"x4"x0.25" - very slim and easy to take with you. I keep these bags in the side compartment of my car door. I don't use the ones you buy at the store anymore since those are so bulky and you end up leaving them in the trunk.
customer_reviews.author: BV

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to plastic and paper bags
customer_reviews.text: First of all, look how absolutely friggin adorable this bag is! The "Yolk" color is the cutest thing! It is wicked durable. I usually use it to carry groceries and it holds a lot of my groceries well. It's definitely a lot bigger than what I expected. But I think the bigger size makes it better for carrying heavier/bulkier items. There aren't many seams in the bag, making it less likely to rip at the handles like most reusable bags. Really loving it :) Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everyone asks where I got them
customer_reviews.text: I've used these bags for years and now that plastic grocery bags are being banned, I'll love them even more. So handy to carry five bags inside a sixth one, to the grocery store...they take up such a small space...and carry so much more volume and weight than either those disposable bags or the store provided reusable bags. Almost every time I have used them, someone will comment on them and ask where I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I use this Baggu bag daily. I am always so suprised how much it can hold. I live in NYC and am constantly schlepping groceries from the store to my apartment. I can shove 4 regular size grocery bags worth of stuff into my Baggu and it's a much easier way to carry it all home. Also sometimes use a Baggu bag to throw my gym clothes in. So many uses! Staple purchase everyone should have. I'm starting to collect more because I love so many of the other patterns :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So useful!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! I always forgot to bring my plastic shopping bags but these fold up so nicely in their little pouches that I just keep a couple in my purse. They’re surprisingly strong for being so light, and I have stuffed up to five IKEA pillows into one bag, so they hold a lot! Bonus points for the fun alpaca print.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to keep in your car/purse
customer_reviews.text: Love these bags! So easy to store in my purse - folds into a small square and takes up little space. They are very sturdy and larger than they appear, I actually wish they made mini ones - would be useful and adorable! So cute and fashionable as well, love the prints.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: - these are the perfect size - the material is washable and dries quickly ...
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I think about using other reusable shopping bags and just the thought of it makes me unfathomably depressed. I've been using Baggu bags since 2006 when my company gave them as christmas presents after our city outlawed plastic bags at grocery stores. - these are the perfect size - the material is washable and dries quickly - they get as compact as you need them to be making them great for traveling and camping
customer_reviews.author: PDV

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bags
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Large capacity, thin but very durable material, fun colors and patterns, and they fold easily into a lightweight little square. I toss one in my purse and I'm ready to carry a couple of grocery bags' worth of stuff. I've tried various reusable bags before, but found them too flimsy or small, or too difficult to fold up correctly. These are the first I've bought extras of.
customer_reviews.author: riverrat01

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional.
customer_reviews.text: Adorable radish design. Super cute and I like that it's easy to clean. Only draw back is that it slips off my shoulder. Not sure why, I have broad shoulders, and this isn't a thing for me usually. Small issue, still love it. I'll buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Hall

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Reusable Bag
customer_reviews.text: I've used Baggu bags for years for shopping and for travel. Bag fits nicely into a pocket. I bought this bag because I liked the pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Woof

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Reusable Bag
customer_reviews.text: I have had a Baggu reusable tote for several years that lives unnoticed in my purse and is always handy when I need a bag. Now that we are required to pay for bags in CA (smh), I purchased another bc my other bags never seem to emerge from my trunk until it is too late. The bags are light, tough, well made. Always refold easily for storage in the included cover. And you can pack em high, easily hold the weight of 6 bottles of wine (necessary in CA). Thanks Baggu making a great and durable product. I look forward to using my shark bag and bought two more for fun gifts.
customer_reviews.author: AB2

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy yet Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: The tulip pattern I got is no longer available, too bad because it's adorable! I got this to bring with me to the Netherlands for when I shopped around. Months later, I still use it frequently. I get compliments on it everytime I use it. It holds a lot of weight and it's big enough that I can hold this bag over my shoulder. Usually with reusable bags the straps are so small I can barely fit my big arms through this. But this works like a dream. It's made with quality material and comes with a little pouch for you to tuck it away between uses Highly recommend this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Crissy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags! I have 2 of the standard size & im surprised at how much they hold. So far they’ve held up to cases of water or pop. Easy to fold & don’t take up a bunch of room in your purse. Highly recommend & I will be purchasing more
customer_reviews.author: Brittani Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: this is the perfect vehicle to transport it all
customer_reviews.text: I've ended up using it more than I thought I would. Actually I don't use it for shopping. But if you're going to friends or family get togethers...and you might be taking food, drinks, games, your tablet, and "what not"...this is the perfect vehicle to transport it all. It is cute, and I've had several people ask about it or comment on it. I show them how easily it folds up and how lightweight it is to keep on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Gee Ess

customer_reviews.title: Baggus are my favorite!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are seriously perfect- great for tossing in your coat pocket or other bag in case you stop somewhere to grab groceries or run a few errands while out and about! They pack up nice and small, plus they’re both lightweight and durable. And you can’t beat the cute designs!
customer_reviews.author: Emily S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and packable bag.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. Yet I was able to check it out in person, it seems like it's made from a very durable tent- like material. Interesting color. Folds nicely into an envelope type shape.
customer_reviews.author: Lori V

customer_reviews.title: Best reusable bags
customer_reviews.text: Baggu are my favorite reusable bags! They fold compactly into the carrying case, but are quite large and hold a lot. The patterns are super cute and I own several. They are lightweight, so I always carry one everywhere with me. They are also machine washable.
customer_reviews.author: Fabuls

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Large
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as stocking stuffers for family members and one for myself. They are sturdy and large, yet pack up nicely back into their covers. I keep one in my purse. I will probably buy more for myself to use while grocery shopping, when I need several bags.
customer_reviews.author: pangea

customer_reviews.title: Reduce plastic use!
customer_reviews.text: In my quest to reduce as much plastic from my life as I can, I purchased this bag. It is great! I am urban so I walk to and from the grocery store. This carries quite a bit and is easy to throw in my purse when empty. Durable and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Form over function here
customer_reviews.text: The red colour is great, the ease with which it folds into the pouch is fine but I like the look of this bag more than how it works. The handles feel oddly uncomfortable on my arm. Seattle banned single-use plastic carrier bags some time ago so this isn't my first reusable and unfortunately, I'd say it's my least favourite. Had I handled this in person to see how it felt in my hand, I probably wouldn't have bought it.
customer_reviews.author: SeattlePea

customer_reviews.title: Easy & sustainable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag mainly to take on our travels to carry souvenirs and groceries. I carry it in the pocket of my purse until needed or could fit it in my pocket if I don’t want to carry a purse. And it’s cute!
customer_reviews.author: The Rose

customer_reviews.title: The best reusable and stylish shopping bags!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these reusable bags to take to California where they don’t use plastic bags & you have to bring your own; not only at the grocery store but also places like Target. Lightweight, stylish, super easy to pack as they take up no space & are incredibly lightweight. Super convenient and an excellent value. Also very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Coolbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bags!!  Great quality and so practical
customer_reviews.text: These bags are fabulous! I live in Chicago where the bag tax is in full force so having these bags in my purse really comes in handy! They really can carry a lot of weight and way more spacious than plastic grocery bags! I gave some of these out as Xmas gifts this year and they were a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Folds back up easily
customer_reviews.text: My biggest concern was that it would be difficult to get the bag back into its little sleeve but it's really not hard. It expands into a large tote that is both supper cute and practical. I keep one in my purse and one in my backpack. The price may seem high but the quality is there to back it up.
customer_reviews.author: ARH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best reusable bag available. It fits easily into a purse or pocket and will hold a lot, as much as you can fit into it. I put it in the washing machine to clean it when needed. I use it for almost all shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: More Baggus!
customer_reviews.text: I needed some additional bags, and Baggus are my first choice. I might just buy some more for convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: These bags hold a lot!! Easy to carry when full ! Love the fact they are easy to wash - easy to fold - and they look nice! Had to buy more! The baggers at the grocery store always love them! I no longer have any plastic grocery bags in my home! Great for our environment!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the original
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these and love them. This is not the original product. It is cheap material, stiff paper-like consistency; not at all the soft and durable real product.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Baggu shopping bags are strong, a good size & last for years.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a Baggu bag for a couple of years & it is strong & a good size. I 💛 the 3 tartan-plaid designs in this set. They’ll last many years. I plan to divvy up 1 set for holiday gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A MUST BUY
customer_reviews.text: A MUST BUY!!! Best bags ever. The company is amazing, if you every have to contac them they answer any questions. I found a bag on clearence once and have been buying them ever since. They fold up better then any bag I have encountered and everyone asks me about them.
customer_reviews.author: kpp125

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I love this reusable shopping bag. It’s large and durable, and can fit a lot of groceries. I like how little room it takes up in my purse when it’s folded up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get it, it’s an essential
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 and they save me so much trouble. They are small so I can always keep them in my bag or coat pocket. They hold a pretty fair amount, including heavy items! Never again will I rush home to beat the handle ripping off my paper bag. They also keep me from having to use aforementioned bags and creating waste. also they are v cute!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Strong, compact, and cute prints!
customer_reviews.text: Love Baggu bags. I have a number of baggu bags and have used them regularly for years now. Their standard size is bigger than a regular grocery store bag so I only need to take a few to haul groceries in. They're very compact and sturdy. Easy to wash too. The prices have gone up since I purchased them years ago but I still consider 10 bucks to be worth it. Loving my new shark print baggu bag!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Love the bag but the only annoying thing is that ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag but the only annoying thing is that the straps are on sideways! They should be on the opposite side of the bag, like a purse. When you fill the bag up and go to put it on your shoulders it's very very awkwardly posistioned due to where the handles are and how everything lays inside.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah S. Bartscht

customer_reviews.title: Compact. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Great during distancing. This bag is compact and easy to put in a pocket. [I lost the little bag almost immediately. I just cram the bag into a pocket.] Very easy to clean in soap and water and dries very quickly. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MarkB

customer_reviews.title: Love love, and love!
customer_reviews.text: These bags have very cute prints. I always keep one in my purse. They are super roomy, and I do not need to use any store bags when I shop. They save so many bags and save the environment. I love the small pouch that comes with the bag, because ir keep the bag so neat. The bag is also very easy to clean. I got quite a few of them for my friends and relatives. They are great gifts!
customer_reviews.author: zimin huang

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are extremely sturdy and fold up very small into a matching pouch. I carry a small crossbody purse and all three fit easily in my purse while shopping. They hold an enormous amount of groceries, which was kind of surprising. I’ll be buying one more set of 3 and they will replace all the other shipping bags I’ve accumulated. Absolutely worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: hannah banana

customer_reviews.title: Reduce waste
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for reducing plastic waste! I use this for groceries and it does carry quite a lot. Has held up quite nicely and folds easily enough to keep in your back pocket. All purpose use! Used it for carrying beach necessities. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Perpetua

customer_reviews.title: Love my baggu!
customer_reviews.text: I was given my first Baggu a few years ago as a gift and was immediately hooked. This year I bought myself a second one. They fit in my handbag and are easy to take out whenever needed. I probably use them 4-5 times a week. They've both held up beautifully and look as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Prokop

customer_reviews.title: best reusable grocery bag
customer_reviews.text: This is my new go-to bag! Fits more groceries than a regular bag from the store and definitely won't tear. One of them got dirty and I threw it in the wash, and it looked brand new when it was done!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Far and away my favorite reusable bags. I am never without them. I own four and would buy a dozen more. Easy to clean (just throw them in the washing machine on cold and line dry), incredibly lightweight and sturdy. Unlike most bags of their kind, you can actually fold & fit them back in the pouch they come in! Highest recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Fits a lot and is durable
customer_reviews.text: You'd be amazed how much you can shove in these bags. I really push grocery bags to their limits as I walk to and from the grocery store and tend to buy as much as I can physically carry and have not had one tear on me yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Good for carrying small amounts. I wanted it to hold more for the price. It is slightly stretchable.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Ehrenberg

customer_reviews.title: In Love !! <3
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing about my baggu that I don't like! All of their patterns are adorable. The bag folds up nice and small and easily fits in a backpack, purse, fanny pack, or pocket. I take it will me grocery shopping and I can hold like 5 bags worth of food, depending on the size of things. I try to use it every chance I can. they even let me use it when I went thrift shopping and it fit two puffy jackets a pair of pants and several dishes. It feels very sturdy and durable. Made of nylon so its very easy to wash and dry. I love my bagguuuuu <<<<3
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but durable bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is fantastic. It's strong and very spacious, fits nicely over my shoulder, and folds up to the size of my palm. It weighs very little, so you can easily slip it into your purse so you'll have it for any impromptu shopping. Love that it comes in fun designs. I'm recommending it to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Martha S.

customer_reviews.title: Takes up minimal space when not in use
customer_reviews.text: Always in my purse for unexpected trips! I’ve used it a dozen times and after I’ve put my groceries away I simply refold it, put it back in the cover and in my purse for next time.
customer_reviews.author: Calli Nermoe

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags
customer_reviews.text: Have had 3 of them for 2.5 years now, and they're still going strong, but just wanted to purchase another to have on hand. The little pouch fits perfectly into my purse so that when I'm at the store, I always have a bag handy.
customer_reviews.author: renaissance woman

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Sturdy, and Roomy Shopping Bags
customer_reviews.text: I use them for groceries and all shopping. They are very sturdy even with heavy items like canned foods. This standard size is good for most shopping, and the larger baggu bag is good for large items like paper towels and cereal boxes. I gave them for Christmas gifts too.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Best bag ever!
customer_reviews.text: This folds easily into its pouch and fits in my purse. It’s great for the times I run in the store having left my canvas shopping bag in the car. It’s lightweight, and sturdy. I’ll be purchasing more of them for my friends and me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No excuse for forgetting your own bag
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent. Pouch is small enough to carry in my wallet. Expand to carry contents of 2 plastic grocery bags. I'm buying these for everyone on my gift list.
customer_reviews.author: J. J.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: This can be stored in really small bags and I love it. I can fit so much groceries in it and I don't have to carry those grocery store totes that are bulky and can't fold. A must buy if you don't like using plastic bags.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: I'm a believer
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about baggu being another fad product. I gave in and tried one out in a pursuit to stop paying every time I buy bags at the grocery store, and holy crap do these things work. I have no fear about a ripped bag and dropped groceries and I can carry heavy hauls home without the handles digging into my shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great if you love random compliments from strangers
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality. It's bigger than I expected. Almost too big. I get compliments on it all the time which was unexpected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Over priced and aggravating to use
customer_reviews.text: These do what they say fairly well but are too expensive. Go to Puglitz and get one for 99 cents.
customer_reviews.author: Ellis Counts

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my sister. She loves it! Very easy to fold away, and yet can expand to hold a significant amount of groceries, laundry, what have you.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Extremely durable!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Baggu bag. Bought the first one five years ago, and it’s still holding up well. You can load these with 2 one gallon containers and additional groceries, and they won’t rip. Awesome for a car-free city life!
customer_reviews.author: Constine

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than you might think
customer_reviews.text: I have been eyeing Baggu products for a few months before I decided to buy this on a whim. It’s a pretty large bag, larger than a standard grocery store bag. It is more like a tote. It’s super cute and looks exactly like the picture, plus it is really sturdy (can hold 50 lbs.). The reason I gave it 4 stars is because it is larger than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Florek

customer_reviews.title: Charming patterns and lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: Love the black & white gingham check - so charming! Its lightweight and packs easily and flat in the small matching pouch (4 1/2" sq). This is my 2nd Baggu, as the first was given to me as a gift from a friend. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Queen Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Bag it
customer_reviews.text: Fold tiny. Take them every where. Wash and reuse with no wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley McCain

customer_reviews.title: Bring in all the groceries in one trip!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are so strong! They become very soft after a few uses. All the patterns are so beautiful and I even get compliments on them. I even use these bags as purses sometimes! They are great, I feel so good not having to waste bags at the grocery store!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: BAGGU Standard Reusable Shopping Bag, Ripstop Nylon Grocery Tote or Lunch Bag
feature_bullets: NEWLY UPDATED - Our best selling reusable bag is not just for the grocery store, it goes everywhere and hauls (practically) anything. Now uses recycled fabric!
ECO-FRIENDLY & STYLISH - Long-lasting, reusable Baggus reduce waste while looking fabulous!
TOTES UP TO 50 LBS. - Strong yet lightweight, this Baggu can hold up to 50 lbs. of stuff yet folds into just a 5x5 in. square.
100% RIPSTOP NYLON - Baggu's commitment to quality means we only use pure ripstop nylon to craft our standard Baggus
MACHINE WASHABLE - Machine wash cold and line dry to use your favorite Baggu for years and years!
